"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>eb473c43-227d-11d8-8380-000acd021b2b#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Török Birodalom kialakulása</string>
            <string language="en">The rise of the Turkish Empire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Anstieg des türkischen Reiches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'élévation de l'empire turc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ascensão do império turkish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aumento dell'impero turco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η άνοδος της τουρκικής αυτοκρατορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La subida del imperio turco</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Török Birodalom kialakulása, terjeszkedése, hadserege, államszervezete</string>
            <string language="en">The rise, expansion, army and state organization of the Turkish Empire</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">oszmán,  török,  szultán,  hódítás,  janicsár ,  szpáhi,  </string>
            <string language="en">Ottoman, Turkish, sultan, conquest, janissary, spahi</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anstieg-, Expansions-, Armee- und 
Zustandorganisation des türkischen Reiches</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'organisation d'élévation, d'expansion, 
d'armée et d'état de l'empire turc</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A organização da ascensão, da expansão, do 
exército e do estado do império turkish</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aumento, l'espansione, esercito e 
dichiara l'organizzazione dell'impero turco</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οργάνωση ανόδου, επέκτασης, στρατού και κράτους της
τουρκικής αυτοκρατορίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La organización de la subida, de la extensión, 
del ejército y del estado del imperio turco</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ottoman, das Türkische, Sultan, Eroberung, 
Janissary, spahi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tabouret, Turc, sultan, conquête, Janissary, spahi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ottoman, Turkish, sultan, conquest, janissary, spahi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottoman, Turco, sultan, conquista, janissary, spahi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οθωμανός, Τούρκος, σουλτάνος, κατάκτηση, janissary, 
spahi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Otomano, Turco, sultán, conquista, janissary, spahi</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
